name: Michael Osborne Design
biography:
1981  MOD/Michael Osborne Design, founded in April. Principals: Michael Osborne, President and Creative Director; Paul Kagiwada; Michelle Regenbogen.
MOD specializes in corporate and brand identity, packaging design and print collateral.
Award venues include West Coast Show, American Institute of Graphic Arts and Clios.
Work featured in Graphis, Communication Arts, The Society of Typographic Arts, HOW magazine and numerous print annuals.
In addition to the SFMOMA MuseumStore shopping bag in the Cooper-Hewitt collection, MOD has designed other shopping bags, logos, and a variety of gift items including cups, notebooks, etc.
1991  Michael Osborne and Norman Clayton formed One Heart Press, letterpress shop, San Fransisco.

Source: ww.modsf.com, March 2000.
